subject: DGR sponsorship of ex-servicemen for toll plazas of NHAI
text: Hrrd4 Trftv TTTHN wfedr"t T4 Phone 91.11-25074100125074200 (4a 7z6 qRarT 37 Tanw) GAFF /Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 MUZT National Highways Authority of India QFT 'Extn;; 2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport and Highways} 7-5 Va 6, 7427-10, #RGT T f874-110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka_ New Delhi-110075 th NHAI/13013/22/05-O6/CMD-COIDGR (Vol. III) 11 July; 2005 CIRCULARNO NHAIICOMMERCIAL QPERATIONSI62 Sub: DGR sponsorship of ex-servicemen for toll plazas of NHAI. In partial modification of Circular no_ NHAICommercial Operations/14 dated 20.02.2003 providing guidelines for seeking sponsorship of ex-servicemen from Directorate General Resettlement (DGR) for managing toll plazas, We have been advised that   future correspondence in this regard should be made at the following address: Joint Director (Employment) Directorate General Resettlement Ministry of Defence West Block-IV , R K Puram; New Delhi 110066 TelelFax: 26192354 Accordingly, henceforth, the sponsorship will be dealt by Employment Directorate of DGR in place of Self Employment Directorate of DGR. Further in view of decreased availability of Ex-Defence officers to  provide requisite manpower in stipulaled time , DGR has decided to spcnsor DGR sponsored security agencies operated by Ex-Defence officers in place of individual officers. This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. Please acknowledge. (M Lohia) General Manager (CQ) To AII PIUs/CMUs NHAI to; 1 PS to Chairman 2. AII MembersICVo 3.
